title: A Promise Fulfilled. The Marquess’s Son-in-Law Is Showered with Love
description:
"When I grow up, I'll ask my father and promise to come for you. So please, hold on until then."

These words from Vee, a girl he met as a child, became the boy's emotional support, even if it was just a verbal promise.

Theodore, the second son of the House of Count Allerton, is forced to handle all the paperwork that his older brother, Rodrick, should be doing. Unable to match his brother, a member of the Royal Capital's Knightly Order, in skill, Theodore quietly performs these tasks. However, their parents are oblivious to this reality, believing that the younger brother is merely assisting the heir of the family.

An offer of marriage into the family of the Marquess Harvey suddenly comes to Theodore. His father, wanting to establish a connection with the marquess's family, which is favored by the royal family, quickly decides to push Theodore into it. When Theodore arrives at the marquess's home, the one waiting for him is the very same girl from all those years ago.
author: Yumi Yamabuki

title: The Girl I Met on the Matchmaking App Turned Out to Be My Student
description:
Shugo Kizaki, a high school teacher, starts using a dating app after the wedding of a friend.

Through a chance encounter, he meets the highly popular (with over 1000 “likes”) beautiful girl “Sakuran” on the app.

However, Sakuran turns out to be—his student (a high schooler)!?

“You’re underestimating the app, Sensei! I’ll teach you how to become popular on the app!”

After saving Sakuran from a crisis, Shugo is taught the secrets to gaining attention on the app as a reward.

He begins his search for the ideal partner, charging ahead into the battlefield of dating apps!

From Jun Minosaki, the author of Hundred series, comes a love hunting guide and romantic comedy!!
author: Shio Koji

title: I Started Working a Housekeeping Job and Ended up Being Liked by the Family of the Most Beautiful Girl in School
description:
During his second year of high school, Haruto Otsuki starts a part-time job in housekeeping during the summer vacation. His first client turns out to be none other than Ayaka Tojo, the most beautiful girl in school! Despite being bewildered by this unexpected turn of events, Haruto continues doing his housekeeping duties. Over time, he becomes well-liked by Ayaka’s family and begins regularly visiting her house.

From making home-cooked meals that delight Ayaka, to going grocery shopping together like a newlywed couple, and even going on shy movie dates like young lovers, they begin to grow closer by spending these special moments outside of school. This charming and awkward housekeeping rom-com featuring the most innocent and beautiful girl in school and a secretly high-spec guy begins!
author: Shiohon
